title: Electricity and heat
creator_credit: Langton Gould-Marks, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
brief_description: The heating effect of an electric current is shown to be a clue to agitation of the aubital electrons; the difference between series and modern applications of electric heating are demonstrated.
creator_credit_for_label: Langton Gould-Marks, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
